title: Change the homepage of the shop
Categories - missing
Categories - deactivate
text: You cannot deactivate a category…. To avoid setting the shop into maintenance mode and thereby preventing sales for the duration, highlight the articles that should not be available any more and change their status either to zur INFO ZURINFO: The item is transfered to the shop to inform shop visitors about new items. The FldAtWebanzeige Display field is set (true). The item cannot be ordered regardless of the stock. Purpose: * Advance notice of new articles or • Articles that no longer exist or INACTIVE: The item is transfered to the shop in order to maintain the item (image assignment). The FldAtWebanzeige Display field remains set to false. The article must be assigned to at least one category in order for it to be transfered to the shop. https://knowledge.cowis.net/index.php?action=artikel&cat=25&id=203&artlang=de Markierte Artikel bearbeiten Via the menu item "Markierte Artikel bearbeiten", mass changes of certain data can be made for all marked articles. More functions have been added here and the menu entries are now sorted alphabetically.
description:
You cannot deactivate a category…. 

 

To avoid setting the shop into maintenance mode and thereby preventing sales for the duration, highlight the articles that should not be available any more and change their status either to zur INFO 

 

ZURINFO: The item is transfered to the shop to inform shop visitors about new items. The FldAtWebanzeige Display field is set (true). The item cannot be ordered regardless of the stock. Purpose: * Advance notice of new articles or • Articles that no longer exist

or 

INACTIVE: The item is transfered to the shop in order to maintain the item (image assignment). The FldAtWebanzeige Display field remains set to false. The article must be assigned to at least one category in order for it to be transfered to the shop.

 

https://knowledge.cowis.net/index.php?action=artikel&cat=25&id=203&artlang=de

 

Markierte Artikel bearbeiten

  • Via the menu item "Markierte Artikel bearbeiten", mass changes of certain data can be made for all marked articles. More functions have been added here and the menu entries are now sorted alphabetically.
